process.sectionSubtitle: A structured, transparent workflow ensuring seamless international trade from consultation to delivery

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We discuss your product requirements, conduct market analysis, review quality standards, and provide detailed cost estimates. Required documents include product specifications, technical datasheets, and business registration.

step2.title: Certification & Compliance
step2.description: We identify and verify required certifications (ISO, CE, FDA), ensure regulatory compliance, and handle licensing requirements. Documents include existing certificates, test reports, and compliance checklists.

step3.title: Pricing & Terms
step3.description: Negotiate pricing, payment terms (LC, TT), shipping terms (FOB, CIF, EXW), and Incoterms agreement. We prepare proforma invoice, price quotation, and finalize packaging specifications.

step4.title: Contract Finalization
step4.description: Draft and review sales contract, finalize terms, obtain signatures, and confirm payment arrangements. Key documents include purchase contract, purchase order (PO), and Letter of Credit.

step5.title: Procurement & Production
step5.description: Coordinate with suppliers, monitor production progress, conduct quality inspections, and arrange proper packaging. Regular production status reports and quality certificates provided.

step6.title: Documentation & Logistics
step6.description: Prepare complete trade documentation including commercial invoice, packing list, certificate of origin, and bill of lading. Arrange shipping and book cargo with reliable carriers.

step7.title: Customs Clearance
step7.description: Submit customs declarations with proper HS code classification, coordinate clearance procedures, handle duty and tax payments, and provide real-time tracking throughout transit.

step8.title: Delivery & Support
step8.description: Confirm successful delivery, obtain proof of delivery (POD), handle any post-delivery issues, and provide ongoing support. Complete transaction with final invoice and summary.

process.disclaimer: Please note that the processes listed above are not mandatory. They can vary from one case to another based on individual circumstances.
